long_description: Add the light, sturdy Gerber Freescape Hatchet to your camping tool collection to make tasks like gathering kindling, fashioning shelter or pounding in tent stakes a little easier and way more fun. Forged steel head offers impressive strength; innovative blade sheath stores in the handle while you're using the hatchet. Glass-filled nylon handle featues a soft, molded exterior surface that's easy and comfortable to hold. The Gerber Freescape Hatchet is 17.3 in. long, offering good leverage in a portable size.
short_description: Add the light, sturdy Gerber Freescape Hatchet to your camping tool collection to make tasks like gathering kindling, fashioning shelter or pounding in tent stakes a little easier and way more fun.
